articles.author: Katherine Masters
articles.description: Last-minute shoppers looking for late deals ahead of Christmas may find smaller discounts and fewer items marked down at major retailers including Macy’s (M.N), Target (TGT.N) and Ulta Beauty , according to an analyst and two datasets measuring retailers' recent prices.
articles.title: Not so 'Super' Saturday: Retailers dangle fewer discounts for inflation-weary shoppers

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Bankrupt crypto exchange FTX and its debtors on Friday said they have entered into a settlement agreement with founder Samuel Bankman-Fried and others to resolve some claims related to its acquisition of stock trading platform Embed.
articles.title: FTX debtors settle some claims over Embed deal with Sam Bankman-Fried, others

articles.author: Michael Erman, Manas Mishra
articles.description: Bristol Myers Squibb (BMY.N) on Friday agreed to buy Karuna Therapeutics (KRTX.O) for $14 billion, gaining a promising new type of antipsychotic medicine to help power growth as patents on its older therapies expire later this decade.
articles.title: Bristol Myers to buy schizophrenia drugmaker Karuna Therapeutics for $14 bln

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The Washington Post Guild has reached a tentative agreement with the publisher, the union said in a post on social media platform X on Friday.
articles.title: Washington Post Guild reaches tentative agreement with publisher

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Annual U.S. inflation slowed further below 3% in November and underlying price pressures continued to abate, which could cement financial market expectations for an interest rate cut next March.
articles.title: US annual inflation slows further below 3% in November

articles.author: David Shepardson
articles.description: Tesla (TSLA.O) is recalling just over 120,000 Model S and Model X vehicles in the United States over the risk of doors being unlocked and opening during a crash, the automaker said Friday.
articles.title: Tesla recalls 120,000 vehicles over doors that could unlock in crash

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Lionsgate (LGFa.N) will spin off its studio unit in a blank-check deal that values the business behind the "Hunger Games" and "John Wick" movie franchises at about $4.6 billion including debt, the company said on Friday.
articles.title: Lionsgate to spin off studio business in $4.6-billion SPAC deal

articles.author: Michelle Nichols, Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Dan Williams
articles.description: The U.N. Security Council approved a toned-down bid to boost humanitarian aid to Gaza on Friday that stopped short of a call for a ceasefire, hours after Israel signalled it was widening its ground offensive in the Palestinian enclave.
articles.title: UN pushes for more aid into Gaza, Israel widens offensive

articles.author: John Kruzel
articles.description: The U.S. Supreme Court on Friday declined to immediately decide former President Donald Trump's claim that he cannot be prosecuted for trying to overturn his 2020 election defeat, allowing a lower court to continue reviewing the issue.
articles.title: Supreme Court rejects prosecutor's request, won't rule on Trump immunity yet

articles.author: Wendell Roelf
articles.description: Shipping companies sailing around the Cape of Good Hope to avoid Houthi attacks on the Red Sea face tough choices over where to refuel and restock, as African ports struggle with red tape, congestion and poor facilities, companies and analysts say.
articles.title: Ships rerouted by Red Sea crisis face overwhelmed African ports
